name: Bloop World
description:
Bloop World is a dangerous place to live, but there is so much challenge, things to explore and fun, that you just don't want to live anywhere else!

You will see quite some snow bumps - most of them are... well... snow bumps. However, some of them actually hide a Life Shread! Let's collect them!

Place torches to reveal the Life Shreads and to stay protected: around torches, your enemies take damage.

Keep yourself away from the winter forest! The more rampant the snowy trees around you, the more Bloobs are going to attack you.

The further away you roam from the center, the more dangerous enemies you'll encounter. Plan accordingly!

Visit shops to purchase incredibly useful items from the money you can find on enemies you kill. Shops have different stocks, so keep exploring them!

The map is randomly generated, so no playthroughs are gonna be the same.

And the rest... you'll figure out on your own!
